name: Bubba the Dog - Virtual pet for Apple Watch + iPhone
name_original: Bubba the Dog - Virtual pet for Apple Watch + iPhone
description:
This is BUBBA, the best virtual pet for iPhone & Apple Watch!

This amazing dog can make a lot of tricks, you can talk to him and he will bark, play with a ball, crawl, roll and much more.

Impress your friends with your voice controlled pet and your Apple Watch.
